Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Prime positioning on Oracle and Tangerine Roads - visibility!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: A master-planned business park in a contemporary environment for work and play. Situated on a 525 acre campus in the heart of the Tucson bio-science region, in the town of Oro Valley, Arizona. Home to Ventana, ICAGEN, Western National Parks Association, Oro Valley Hospital and Meggitt Securaplane.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Prime Retail Development Sites in Innovation Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Prime office and retail space located in Rancho Vistoso in the heart of Oro Valley, Arizona. This established center offers a variety of existing space suitable for office or retail uses.At-door parking for customers and highly visible signage

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite 150 available - DO NOT DISTURB TENANT.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Shop/restaurant/office space located in a busy Fry’s anchored center. Major intersection in Oro Valley with strong neighborhood demographics. Average household income within 1 mile is $94,327 vs $62,495 for Pima County. (Source: Nielsen).Convenient location to town of Oro Valley Municipal Complex and community amenities.
